sentences.Spanish: Si hubiera sabido que venías, habría horneado un pastel
sentences.English: If I had known you were coming, I would have baked a cake

sentences.Spanish: Ella insistió en posponer la reunión hasta la próxima semana
sentences.English: She insisted on putting off the meeting until next week

sentences.Spanish: A pesar de haber estudiado toda la noche, no aprobó el examen
sentences.English: Despite having studied all night, he didn't pass the exam

sentences.Spanish: Cuanto más esperes, más difícil será tomar una decisión
sentences.English: The longer you wait, the harder it will be to make a decision

sentences.Spanish: Después de haber vivido en Japón durante cinco años, se volvió fluido en japonés
sentences.English: After having lived in Japan for five years, he became fluent in Japanese

sentences.Spanish: Si no me lo hubieras recordado, me habría olvidado de la reunión
sentences.English: If you hadn't reminded me, I would have forgotten about the meeting

sentences.Spanish: Una vez que termines de leer el informe, dime qué piensas
sentences.English: Once you finish reading the report, let me know what you think

sentences.Spanish: Terminó renunciando a su trabajo y comenzando su propio negocio
sentences.English: He ended up quitting his job and starting his own business

sentences.Spanish: Ella ha estado posponiendo tomar una decisión sobre su futuro durante demasiado tiempo
sentences.English: She has been putting off making a decision about her future for too long

sentences.Spanish: Si no hubiera sido por tu ayuda, no habría podido terminar el proyecto a tiempo
sentences.English: If it hadn't been for your help, I wouldn't have been able to finish the project on time

sentences.Spanish: Para cuando lleguen, ya habremos comenzado la reunión
sentences.English: By the time they arrive, we will have already started the meeting

sentences.Spanish: Después de haber pasado años viajando, finalmente se estableció en un pequeño pueblo
sentences.English: After having spent years traveling, he finally settled down in a small town

sentences.Spanish: Si estuviera aquí en este momento, podría ayudarnos a resolver este problema
sentences.English: If she were here right now, she would be able to help us resolve this issue

sentences.Spanish: A pesar de haber sido advertido, aún siguió adelante con su plan riesgoso
sentences.English: Despite having been warned, he still went ahead with his risky plan

sentences.Spanish: Una vez que hayas terminado tu tarea, puedes salir afuera y jugar
sentences.English: Once you have finished your homework, you can go outside and play

sentences.Spanish: Estaba a punto de irse cuando sonó el teléfono
sentences.English: He was about to leave when the phone rang

sentences.Spanish: Si pudiera volver atrás en el tiempo, habría hecho las cosas de manera diferente
sentences.English: If I could go back in time, I would have done things differently

sentences.Spanish: Después de haber sido informado varias veces, finalmente entendió las instrucciones
sentences.English: After having been told several times, he finally understood the instructions

sentences.Spanish: Una vez que ella llegue, saldremos a cenar
sentences.English: Once she arrives, we will go out for dinner

sentences.Spanish: Él insiste en ser escuchado antes de que se tome cualquier decisión
sentences.English: He insists on being heard before any decision is made

sentences.Spanish: Si no me hubieran ofrecido el trabajo, habría solicitado en otro lugar
sentences.English: If they hadn't offered me the job, I would have applied somewhere else

sentences.Spanish: Si yo fuera tú, iría al médico
sentences.English: If I were you, I would go to the doctor

sentences.Spanish: Ella cantaría hermosamente si practicara más
sentences.English: She would sing beautifully if she practiced more

sentences.Spanish: Hay algunas manzanas en la mesa
sentences.English: There are some apples on the table

sentences.Spanish: Había demasiado tráfico en el camino al trabajo
sentences.English: There was too much traffic on the way to work

sentences.Spanish: Estas galletas son mejores que esas
sentences.English: These cookies are better than those

sentences.Spanish: Su carro está estacionado allí
sentences.English: Their car is parked over there

sentences.Spanish: No debería comer demasiados dulces
sentences.English: He shouldn't eat too many sweets

sentences.Spanish: Ella habló suavemente al niño
sentences.English: She spoke softly to the child

sentences.Spanish: John caminó lentamente para evitar resbalarse en el hielo
sentences.English: John walked slowly to avoid slipping on the ice

sentences.Spanish: Limpia tu habitación antes de salir
sentences.English: Clean your room before you go out

sentences.Spanish: Creo que él viene mañana
sentences.English: I believe that he is coming tomorrow

sentences.Spanish: Sugerí que ella estudie más para el examen
sentences.English: I suggested that she study harder for the exam

sentences.Spanish: Ella podía nadar a través del lago cuando era más joven
sentences.English: She could swim across the lake when she was younger

sentences.Spanish: El perro olió la comida desde el otro lado de la habitación
sentences.English: The dog smelled the food from across the room

sentences.Spanish: Jack corre más rápido que Jill
sentences.English: Jack runs faster than Jill

sentences.Spanish: Este es el pastel más delicioso que he probado
sentences.English: This is the most delicious cake I have ever tasted

sentences.Spanish: Él me entregó el libro
sentences.English: He handed me the book

sentences.Spanish: ¿Es este tu bolígrafo?
sentences.English: Is this your pen?

sentences.Spanish: Es importante que ellos estén aquí a tiempo
sentences.English: It is important that they be here on time

sentences.Spanish: Si nos vamos ahora, alcanzaremos el tren
sentences.English: If we leave now, we will catch the train

sentences.Spanish: Había diez personas en la reunión de ayer
sentences.English: There were ten people at the meeting yesterday

sentences.Spanish: Quiero un poco de queso con mi sándwich
sentences.English: I want some cheese with my sandwich

sentences.Spanish: Hay demasiados autos en la carretera hoy
sentences.English: There are too many cars on the road today

sentences.Spanish: ¡Mira ese hermoso atardecer!
sentences.English: Look at that beautiful sunset!

sentences.Spanish: Ellos van a la casa de su amigo
sentences.English: They're going to their friend's house

sentences.Spanish: Ella tiene demasiado trabajo que hacer hoy
sentences.English: She has too much work to do today

sentences.Spanish: Él habría terminado el proyecto si tuviera más tiempo
sentences.English: He would have finished the project if he had more time

sentences.Spanish: Hay un artículo interesante en el periódico
sentences.English: There is an interesting article in the newspaper

sentences.Spanish: Ella es más alta que su hermana
sentences.English: She is taller than her sister

sentences.Spanish: Estos zapatos son más cómodos que esos
sentences.English: These shoes are more comfortable than those

sentences.Spanish: Esa fue la película más emocionante que he visto en todo el año
sentences.English: That was the most exciting movie I've seen all year

sentences.Spanish: Su auto está estacionado allí
sentences.English: His car is parked over there

sentences.Spanish: Te habría llamado si tuviera tu número
sentences.English: She would have called you if she had your number

sentences.Spanish: Por favor, escriba su nombre en este formulario
sentences.English: Please write your name on this form

sentences.Spanish: ¿Puedes ayudarme con mi tarea?
sentences.English: Can you help me with my homework?

sentences.Spanish: Ella está llegando mañana
sentences.English: She is arriving tomorrow

sentences.Spanish: Espero que él venga a la fiesta
sentences.English: I hope that he comes to the party

sentences.Spanish: No quedaban sillas en la habitación
sentences.English: There were no chairs left in the room

sentences.Spanish: Quería comprar algo de fruta en el mercado
sentences.English: He wanted to buy some fruit at the market

sentences.Spanish: Hay demasiados estudiantes en el salón de clases
sentences.English: There are too many students in the classroom

sentences.Spanish: No me gusta esta película; aquella es mejor
sentences.English: I don't like this movie; that one is better

sentences.Spanish: Ella tiene su propio carro
sentences.English: She has her own car

sentences.Spanish: Deberías visitar a tus abuelos más seguido
sentences.English: You should visit your grandparents more often

sentences.Spanish: Él siempre come la cena rápidamente
sentences.English: He always eats dinner quickly

sentences.Spanish: Saca la basura antes de irte a la cama
sentences.English: Take out the trash before you go to bed

sentences.Spanish: Ella cree que él pasará el examen
sentences.English: She believes that he will pass the test

sentences.Spanish: Es crucial que ellos lleguen a tiempo
sentences.English: It is crucial that they arrive on time

sentences.Spanish: Si estuviera más cálido, iríamos a nadar
sentences.English: If it were warmer, we would go swimming

sentences.Spanish: Compré algunos libros nuevos en la librería
sentences.English: I bought some new books at the bookstore

sentences.Spanish: Hubo mucho ruido en la fiesta de anoche
sentences.English: There was a lot of noise at the party last night

sentences.Spanish: Estos zapatos son más elegantes que esos
sentences.English: These shoes are more stylish than those

sentences.Spanish: Esa fue la conferencia más interesante a la que he asistido
sentences.English: That was the most interesting lecture I've ever attended

sentences.Spanish: Nuestro perro se comió su comida
sentences.English: Our dog ate their food

sentences.Spanish: Ella habría terminado la carrera si no se hubiera caído
sentences.English: She would have finished the race if she hadn't fallen

sentences.Spanish: Por favor, tráeme ese libro
sentences.English: Please bring me that book

sentences.Spanish: Puedes irte de la fiesta temprano si quieres
sentences.English: You can leave the party early if you want

sentences.Spanish: Ella viene a visitarnos la próxima semana
sentences.English: She is coming to visit us next week

sentences.Spanish: Es necesario que él asista a la reunión
sentences.English: It is necessary that he attend the meeting

sentences.Spanish: Había muchas personas en el concierto de anoche
sentences.English: There were a lot of people at the concert last night

sentences.Spanish: Él compró una camisa nueva en la tienda
sentences.English: He bought a new shirt at the store

sentences.Spanish: Hay demasiada tarea que hacer esta noche
sentences.English: There is too much homework to do tonight

sentences.Spanish: Estos zapatos son más caros que esos
sentences.English: These shoes are more expensive than those

sentences.Spanish: Esa fue la comida más deliciosa que he tenido
sentences.English: That was the most delicious meal I've ever had

sentences.Spanish: Su bicicleta está en su garaje
sentences.English: His bicycle is in their garage

sentences.Spanish: Él habría ido al concierto si tuviera entradas
sentences.English: He would have gone to the concert if he had tickets

sentences.Spanish: Por favor, lee este libro antes de la próxima semana
sentences.English: Please read this book before next week

sentences.Spanish: Debes usar casco mientras conduces una motocicleta
sentences.English: You must wear a helmet while riding a motorcycle

sentences.Spanish: Ella está trabajando duro para terminar su proyecto
sentences.English: She is working hard to finish her project

sentences.Spanish: Es vital que ellos lleguen a tiempo
sentences.English: It is vital that they arrive on time

sentences.Spanish: Si él hubiera estudiado más, habría aprobado el examen
sentences.English: If he had studied more, he would have passed the exam

sentences.Spanish: Compré un libro interesante en la librería
sentences.English: I bought an interesting book at the bookstore

sentences.Spanish: Hubo mucha emoción en el juego de anoche
sentences.English: There was a lot of excitement at the game last night

sentences.Spanish: Estos pantalones son más cómodos que esos
sentences.English: These pants are more comfortable than those

sentences.Spanish: Ese fue el rompecabezas más desafiante que he resuelto
sentences.English: That was the most challenging puzzle I've ever solved

sentences.Spanish: Nuestro perro se comió su cena
sentences.English: Our dog ate their dinner

sentences.Spanish: Si me hubieras llamado, te habría ayudado
sentences.English: If you had called me, I would have helped you

sentences.Spanish: Por favor, dame ese documento
sentences.English: Please give me that document

sentences.Spanish: Puedes irte de la fiesta temprano si necesitas
sentences.English: You may leave the party early if you need to

sentences.Spanish: Ella vuelve a casa mañana
sentences.English: She is coming home tomorrow

sentences.Spanish: Es importante que él llegue a tiempo
sentences.English: It is important that he arrive on time

sentences.Spanish: Si estuviera más frío, habríamos encendido una fogata
sentences.English: If it were colder, we would have built a fire

sentences.Spanish: Ella compró un vestido nuevo en el centro comercial
sentences.English: She bought a new dress at the mall

sentences.Spanish: Hay demasiado ruido en esta habitación
sentences.English: There is too much noise in this room

sentences.Spanish: Estas galletas son más deliciosas que esas
sentences.English: These cookies are more delicious than those

sentences.Spanish: Esa fue la presentación más impresionante que he visto
sentences.English: That was the most impressive performance I've ever seen

sentences.Spanish: Su carro está en su entrada
sentences.English: Her car is in their driveway

sentences.Spanish: Si hubiera salido más temprano, no habría perdido el tren
sentences.English: If he had left earlier, he wouldn't have missed the train

sentences.Spanish: Por favor, dame este libro
sentences.English: Please give me this book

sentences.Spanish: Quizás quieras traer un paraguas
sentences.English: You might want to bring an umbrella

sentences.Spanish: Ella está trabajando en su presentación
sentences.English: She is working on her presentation

sentences.Spanish: Es necesario que él termine el informe hoy
sentences.English: It is necessary that he finish the report today

sentences.Spanish: Si estuviera más tranquilo, podría concentrarme mejor
sentences.English: If it were quieter, I could concentrate better
To such an extent
sentences.Spanish: A tal punto

sentences.English: They appear to be blessed
sentences.Spanish: Parecen estar bendecidos

sentences.English: To a degree that even exceeds that person's insight into themselves
sentences.Spanish: A un grado que incluso excede la perspicacia de esa persona en sí misma

sentences.English: Social awareness
sentences.Spanish: Conciencia social
